content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
Dear Isabelle,

this is really the last chance for testing
https://isabelle.in.tum.de/website-Isabelle2023-RC5 --- before everything
becomes final until the next release.

See also
https://isabelle-dev.sketis.net/phame/post/view/68/release_candidates_for_isabelle2023

Especially Windows users should now take a lot, and hopefully confirm that
everything works fine.

Makarius
